amendment.description: To improve the notification of Congress regarding intelligence activities of the United States Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 858 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 858 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562; text: CR S4561) To improve the notification of Congress regarding intelligence activities of the United States Government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 858 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 858 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843.
